events.id: WAFF - Annecy Shorts Best Of Collection Kids 2026-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Annecy Shorts Best Of Collection Kids 2026
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
The Best of Annecy Kids assembles funny, touching and poetic short films that children will adore! New Zealand Premiere — These International shorts are Awards Winner in Annecy festival.

Details The Best of Annecy Kids assembles funny, touching and poetic short films that children will adore!

events.id: WAFF - ChaO-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - ChaO
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Yasuhiro Aoki
In a future society where humans and mermaids coexist, Stephan, a regular office worker at a shipbuilding company, is suddenly proposed to by Chao – a princess from the mermaid kingdom! In the tradition of Studio Ghibli where imaginary world intertwines and create “more than human” situations.

For Teens, Young Adults, Adults

New Zealand Premiere — Winner Annecy Jury Award
events.description:
Details Directed by Yasuhiro Aoki In a future society where humans and mermaids coexist, Stephan, a regular office worker at a shipbuilding company, is suddenly proposed to by Chao – a princess from the mermaid kingdom!
In the tradition of Studio Ghibli where imaginary world intertwines and create “more than human” situations.
For Teens, Young Adults, Adults New Zealand Premiere — Winner Annecy Jury Award

events.id: WAFF - Dandelion's Odyssey-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Dandelion's Odyssey
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Momoko Seto
Dandelion, Baraban, Léonto and Taraxa, four dandelion achenes rescued from a succession of nuclear explosions destroying the Earth, find themselves hurled into the cosmos, stranded on an unknown planet, in search of a soil suitable for the survival of their species. But the elements, fauna, flora and climate are just some of the obstacles they must overcome.
For Kids, teens, Family, Adults

NZ Premiere — Annecy Paul Grimault Award. Winner of the FIPRESCI Prize at Cannes 2025 (Critics’ Week)
events.description:
Details Directed by Momoko Seto Dandelion, Baraban, Léonto and Taraxa, four dandelion achenes rescued from a succession of nuclear explosions destroying the Earth, find themselves hurled into the cosmos, stranded on an unknown planet, in search of a soil suitable for the survival of their species.
But the elements, fauna, flora and climate are just some of the obstacles they must overcome.
For Kids, teens, Family, Adults NZ Premiere — Annecy Paul Grimault Award.
Winner of the FIPRESCI Prize at Cannes 2025 (Critics’ Week)

events.id: WAFF - Female Landscape: Animation-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Female Landscape: Animation
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Screen Wellington presents an exceptional collection of animated short films by female filmmakers from UNESCO Creative Cities of Film around the world. This exclusive screening provides audiences an opportunity to discover fresh and innovative, international animation.
The Female Landscape Project exemplifies the cultural exchange, shared learning and support Wellington benefits from as a member of the UNESCO Creative Cities Network. Stay on after the screening for an inspiring talk with the featured filmmakers. Moderated by Nic Marshall, the audience will gain insights into different career pathways, challenges and triumphs, as well as the creative process behind these works and the stories that shaped them.

All tickets are booking fee only.
events.description:

Stay on after the screening for an inspiring talk with the featured filmmakers.
Moderated by Nic Marshall, the audience will gain insights into different career pathways, challenges and triumphs, as well as the creative process behind these works and the stories that shaped them.

events.id: WAFF - Into the Mortal World-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Into the Mortal World
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Din Zhong
A visually rich Chinese fantasy epic telling the story of The Weaving Maiden's son, Jin Feng, who went down to the world for his mother, and teamed up with a young girl, Xiaofan, to subdue the Starry Nights. People and gods together, all the way to the thrills and dangers, the mystery of Xiaofan's life, the truth of the Weaving Maiden's crime also gradually surfaced.

For Kids, Teens, Family, Young Adults
events.description:
Details Directed by Din Zhong A visually rich Chinese fantasy epic telling the story of The Weaving Maiden's son, Jin Feng, who went down to the world for his mother, and teamed up with a young girl, Xiaofan, to subdue the Starry Nights.

events.id: WAFF - Little Amelie and the Character of Rain-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Little Amelie and the Character of Rain
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Maïlys Vallade, Liane-Cho Han
The story traces the early childhood of Belgian writer Amélie Nothomb in Japan, exploring her unique vision of the world and her relationship with her nanny, Nishio-san.

For Kids, Teens, Family

New Zealand Premiere — Winner Annecy Jury Award. Nominee at the Golden Globe 2026 for Best Motion Picture - Animated.

Nominee at the Oscars 2026 for Best Animated Feature.
events.description:

For Kids, Teens, Family New Zealand Premiere — Winner Annecy Jury Award.

Nominee at the Oscars 2026 for Best Animated Feature.

events.id: WAFF - Mosley-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Mosley
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Kirby Atkins
In ancient times, part of the Thoriphants nation migrated north to escape humans. Today, Mosley the young Thoriphant rebels against this life of servitude and embark on a treacherous journey to find the fabled city of Uprights, where the ancestors live in peace. First NZ-Chinese co-production.

For Kids, Teens, Family
events.description:
Details Directed by Kirby Atkins In ancient times, part of the Thoriphants nation migrated north to escape humans.

events.id: WAFF - Space Cadet-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Space Cadet
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Kid Koala
A silent animated musical on an astronaut girl and her caring robot. The story embarks us in the journey of a young orphan girl and her dream to become an astronaut, nurtured and raised by a caring robot. As she successfully rises to the stars, her robot experiments with the very human feeling of attachment. An international festival favorite!

For Kids, Family

NZ Premiere — Annecy Contrechamp Official Selection
events.description:

events.id: WAFF - Stitch head-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - Stitch head
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Steve Hudson
Follows Stitch Head, a small creature awoken by a Mad Professor in the castle Grotteskew. Stitch head must protect the professor's other creations from the townspeople of Grubbers Nubbin.

For Kids, Teens, Family, Adults

NZ Premiere. International Co-Production

events.id: WAFF - The Most Precious of Cargoes-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - The Most Precious of Cargoes
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Michel Hazanavicius
The story centers on a Holocaust-surviving Jewish girl whose father throws her from a moving train heading to Auschwitz. Ultimately, she’s found by a woodcutter and his family…

For Teens 16+, Young Adults, Adults

First animated feature in Cannes Main Competition since 2008.

Opening film of Annecy 2024. NZ Theatrical Premiere.

events.id: WAFF - The Square-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: WAFF - The Square
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
Directed by Kim Bo-Sol
This acclaimed South Korean independent animation takes us in North Korea, where we will discover a tormented triangle story of love, spying and friendship. Beautifully animated and visually enticing, this film is a must see!

For Teens16+, Young Adults, Adults

NZ Premiere — Annecy Contrechamp Jury Award
